name: ReversingLabs Spectra Analyze
description: ReversingLabs Spectra Analyze integration for real-time file hash lookups

options.name: ReversingLabs' Spectra Analyze URL
options.description: Spectra Analyze Server URL which should include the schema (i.e., https://) and port if required. Defaults to the cloud instance at "https://a1000.reversinglabs.com"

options.name: Password
options.description: ReversingLabs Spectra Analyze password for the provided Username
